definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: The return of the Milu deer is a good example of friendship and cooperation between China and Britain.
sentences.chinese: 麋鹿回归是中英两国友谊和合作的一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: Then he was profiled by the mainland's print media in both Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 然后大陆的中英文平面媒体报导了他。

sentences.english: The students receive the questions in English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 学生会收到中英对照的题目。

sentences.english: As to the China-UK relations, we have made our position clear to the UK.
sentences.chinese: 关于中英关系，我们已多次向英方表明立场。

sentences.english: Zhang Hui, a Senior High School English teacher, joined Guangdong Country Garden School in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 张慧，高中英语教师，2003年加盟碧桂园学校。

sentences.english: Chapter Five is about the requirements for teachers, teaching materials and tests in culture teaching.
sentences.chinese: 第五章阐述初中英语文化教学对教师的要求。

sentences.english: Britain and China were drinking tea large country, there are tea culture phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 中英两国皆为饮茶大国，都存在茶文化现象。

sentences.english: The protagonist is a high school English teacher, 30, Nian sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 本剧的主角是一位30岁的高中英语教师鲇川。

sentences.english: George Macartney Diplomatic Corps' visit to China was one of the important events in the relationship between China and Britain in history.
sentences.chinese: 马葛尔尼使团访华是中英关系史上的一件大事。

sentences.english: Both China-UK relationship and China-EU relationship face important opportunities to build on past success for new progress.
sentences.chinese: 中英关系和中欧关系发展面临继往开来的重要机遇。

sentences.english: There will be a post-show talk in English and Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 演后交流会将以中英文进行。

sentences.english: Simultaneous interpretation and Hong Kong sign interpretation are available for Core Sessions.
sentences.chinese: 大会将于核心会议提供即时中英及手语传译服务。

sentences.english: Please link to the following web addresses for furthur details.
sentences.chinese: 详情请登入以下相关连结网址查询中英文公告。

sentences.english: More than 500 people have written on Mr. Wen’s Facebook “wall,” in Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 超过500人在温家宝总理的留言墙上用中英文留言。

sentences.english: It is elocnted in both Chinese and Engilsh.
sentences.chinese: 这是用中英文双语朗诵的。

sentences.english: He has a good command of English, and his working languages are Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 张夏冰律师精通英语，工作语言为中英文两种。

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 He2 zuo4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: Belt and Road Initiative, Chinese government plan to provide finance and engineering expertise to build infrastructure across Eurasia and northeast Africa, unveiled in 2013
United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
to withdraw from the European Union/abbr. for 脫離歐盟|脱离欧盟
